summary: This mod replaces the Skyrim Galaxy texture with the Dragon Galaxy (yes, it seems a nebula too).
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to
[img]http://s10.postimage.org/wptpultvd/titolo.jpg[/img]
[/center]

* INTRODUCTION *
[size=4]Hey... Psst... Watch me... It\'s not Batman beam right? :D[/size]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod replaces the Skyrim Galaxy texture with the Dragon Galaxy (yes, it seems a nebula too).

* NOTE *
Colors may depends on your configurations like Vanilla, ENB, RCRN or RLwC, etc.

* INSTALL *
1. Make a backup of your skyrimgalaxy.dds in data\\textures\\sky if you have one.
2. Unpack the archive in your data folder and overwrite the old file.

* UNINSTALL *
Just restore the backup file.

* FACEBOOK *
Join me on facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods

* BUGS *
Please report to me any bugs
author: MannyGT
